description: ESLint configuration file using @eslint/eslintrc and FlatCompat for extending Next.js recommended configs and TypeScript support

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Constant holding the filename derived from the module URL

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Constant holding the directory name of the current module

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Instance of FlatCompat used to extend ESLint configurations

methods.name: eslintConfig
methods.description: Array of extended ESLint configurations specific to Next.js and TypeScript
